name: Challenge Foot
overview:
After many simulations of football, which strictly speaking always ignore the problems of financial management, team composition or transfer of players, here is an app that should give you a whole image of this sport.Take the place of a big head in the world of finance. Let's say you made a fortune by selling batteries or shoes ... One fine morning, the urge to buy a football team comes to mind. Who knows, if you get it right, you may be in politics, and god knows how far it can take you. But before drawing plans on the comet, let us return to reality.

A WORLD OF MONEY

Above all, a businessman must know how to get money into an empty box. For this, he will seek sponsors, ask for subsidies from the State or the town hall and will not forget to make deals with the media. Thus, it will propose an exclusive retransmission to this or that television channel. Once these formalities have been completed, our businessman will find himself with a sum of money and will be ready to purchase a football team. For this, he will consult a fairly impressive list of clubs and will make his choice according to the money returned to his fund.

It only remains for him to face other teams and why not, win matches and fly to a very juicy victory.
